content.text:
I understand. I'm Claude Code in read-only mode, ready to help you search and explore this codebase. 

Based on the context, I can see this is a 3D CAD project with:
- A FreeCAD implementation (complete)
- A Fornjot (Rust) implementation (incomplete - currently just a cuboid example)

The project creates a 40x40x15mm box with a triangular hole circumscribed by a 7.5mm radius circle.

I'm ready to help you search through the codebase. I can:
- Find files using glob patterns
- Search code contents with grep/regex
- Read specific files
- Use read-only bash commands (ls, git log, cat, etc.)

I will NOT attempt to modify any files or create new files.

What would you like me to search for or explore in this codebase?
